forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 70, with temperatures falling to around 66 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 13 to 21 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 56. West southwest wind 10 to 21 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph.

weather_report:
A gentle warmth embraces Downtown San Francisco this afternoon, as the sunshine spills over the city’s iconic skyline, weaving a tapestry of golden light. The day reveals a high near 70, with the temperature gracefully easing into the coolness of late afternoon, settling around 66. The west-southwest winds whisper through the streets at a brisk pace, occasionally gusting, adding a refreshing note to the air that invites a stroll along the waterfront or an outdoor café visit. 

As the sun dips lower, the skies remain partly cloaked in soft clouds, hinting at a relaxed evening ahead with a temperature dipping to around 56. The expected marine layer quietly lingers at the edges, yet the heart of the city basks in clarity and charm. Dress lightly but bring a light jacket for when the sun bows out, creating space for cozy gatherings under the dusk sky. Perhaps a leisurely walk through Golden Gate Park, or indulging in a quiet moment with a good book in a tucked-away café would harmonize beautifully with today’s serene offerings.
